mapper.sql: SELECT children.id FROM t_sys_org, t_sys_org as children WHERE t_sys_org.left_num <= children.left_num AND t_sys_org.right_num >= children.left_num and t_sys_org.id=#{ownerOrgId} order by t_sys_org.node_level ASC

SELECT t_bonus_proportion.* FROM t_bonus_proportion WHERE 1=1
AND t_bonus_proportion.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_bonus_proportion.product_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.productId},'%')
AND t_bonus_proportion.bonus_proportion LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.bonusProportion},'%')
AND t_bonus_proportion.type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.type},'%')
AND t_bonus_proportion.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.name},'%')
AND t_bonus_proportion.level LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.level},'%')
AND t_bonus_proportion.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_bonus_proportion.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime)
